data.author: William Arthur Ward
data.quote: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.

data.author: Simone Weil
data.quote: I can, therefore I am.

data.author: J. R. Martinez
data.quote: I'm going to write a book, continue acting, continue motivational speaking and just share with people who I am and what I've learned in my second chance of life and pass it on to people in their first chance of life.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.

data.author: Henry Ward Beecher
data.quote: In this world it is not what we take up, but what we give up, that makes us rich.

data.author: Travis Bradberry
data.quote: When you're working hard and doing all you can to achieve your goals, anything that can give you an edge is powerful and will streamline your path to success.

data.author: Alexander Graham Bell
data.quote: The most successful men in the end are those whose success is the result of steady accretion.

data.author: Black Elk
data.quote: And when I breathed, my breath was lightning.

data.author: John Caudwell
data.quote: Business gives you a massive high. Doing a great deal, coming up with an inspirational solution... It's very addictive. But it doesn't last long. In isolation, it's a bit sterile. It doesn't reward the soul.

data.author: Ella Baker
data.quote: Give light and people will find the way.

data.author: Henry Van Dyke
data.quote: There is a loftier ambition than merely to stand high in the world. It is to stoop down and lift mankind a little higher.

data.author: Taylor Kinney
data.quote: I look up to a strong woman; maybe that's why I fell for Gaga. She works incredibly hard and is very strong and inspirational like Mom, with a great work ethic.

data.author: Bernard Williams
data.quote: Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit.

data.author: David Joseph Schwartz
data.quote: The success combination in business is: Do what you do better... and: do more of what you do.

data.author: Tyga
data.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you do, you'll be successful.

data.author: Charles Luckman
data.quote: Success is that old ABC - ability, breaks, and courage.

data.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
data.quote: That man is a success who has lived well, laughed often and loved much.

data.author: Malala Yousafzai
data.quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.

data.author: Celine Dion
data.quote: The hardest thing to find in life is balance - especially, the more success you have, the more you look to the other side of the gate.

data.author: Osric Chau
data.quote: I do like alternative rock and rap, but as far as inspirational, then I go full-on orchestra. It fills up your entire being.

data.author: Mikhail Bakunin
data.quote: Such a faith would be fatal to my reason, to my liberty, and even to the success of my undertakings; it would immediately transform me into a stupid slave, an instrument of the will and interests of others.

data.author: Wesley Clark
data.quote: When Bill Clinton ran in '92, and I listened to him, and I had of course known of his record from Arkansas, I found him extraordinarily inspirational, and I voted Democratic.

data.author: Martina Navratilova
data.quote: I've a great family, two children to take care of. Then, of course, I do commentary for TV. I do speak about various women's issues around the world - like LGBT, motivational speeches. I have a lot on my plate right now. But eventually, yes, I would like to pass on the knowledge and something that I would like to do.

data.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
data.quote: However things may seem, no evil thing is success and no good thing is failure.

data.author: Bill Cosby
data.quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
